alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kimball, western Banner, southeastern Goshen and east central Laramie Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of La Grange to near Albin. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albin and Harrisburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
